Alpharetta.RiverPines Golf:
RiverPines Golf is a public golf facility located in Johns Creek, Georgia north of Atlanta, Georgia.


== Establishment ==
RiverPines Golf opened in the fall of 1990 as a 9 hole par 3 course and driving range. In the fall of 1992, RiverPines opened the 18 hole championship golf course designed by Denis Griffiths.
